akn:content.akn:p: In addition to such fines, penalties, and fees as may be established pursuant to subsection (a) of this section, the following fines shall be imposed for violations of ยง 6-1041.02:
All fines collected pursuant to this section shall be deposited into the Housing Production Trust Fund.
The Attorney General for the District of Columbia may institute court proceedings to enjoin violations of the Inclusionary Zoning Program.

The District government shall not issue or reissue any license or permit, including a building permit or certificate of occupancy, to any applicant for a license or permit if the applicant is the owner of any Inclusionary Development or unit and found, after a hearing, to be in violation of the Inclusionary Zoning Program until such time as the Mayor certifies that the Inclusionary Development or unit is again in compliance.
